channel.title: Comments on: 3 vs 3 all humans match

item.title: By: Solace
item.dc:creator: Solace
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/3-vs-3-all-humans-match/#comment-27">fanmariopl</a>.
Most definitely! Just one for now though as I want to get the game balance right first without the complication of trying to balance races on many maps.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to fanmariopl.

Most definitely! Just one for now though as I want to get the game balance right first without the complication of trying to balance races on many maps.

item.title: By: fanmariopl
item.dc:creator: fanmariopl
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/3-vs-3-all-humans-match/#comment-26">Solace</a>.
okay, i hope there will be more maps in the future :D
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Solace.

okay, i hope there will be more maps in the future ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Solace
item.dc:creator: Solace
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/3-vs-3-all-humans-match/#comment-25">fanmariopl</a>.
There is currently only one PvP map and one Survival map, so you can change the map by changing the Mode between PvP and Survival before you start the game.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to fanmariopl.

There is currently only one PvP map and one Survival map, so you can change the map by changing the Mode between PvP and Survival before you start the game.

item.title: By: fanmariopl
item.dc:creator: fanmariopl
item.description: how do i change the map?
